code:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
  participant U as User
  participant V as Voice Interface
  participant P as Parser
  participant S as Safety Layer
  participant E as App Engine
  U->>V: Speak wake phrase
  V->>V: WakeWord detected
  V->>V: Capture window (6-10s)
  V->>P: Transcribe + parse intent
  P-->>V: intent + confidence
  V->>S: validate(intent)
  S-->>V: allow / require confirm / block
  alt require confirm
    V->>U: "Confirm?"
    U->>V: "Confirm"
  end
  V->>E: execute(intent)
  E-->>U: UI update + optional narration
```
